Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: costs associated with repurchase of long term debt
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of long term debt and capital securities
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from sale of treasury stock
excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments for proceeds from productive assets
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from failed sale leaseback transactions net
proceeds from sale of productive assets

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in department of labor settlement accrual
increase decrease in income taxes receivable
increase decrease in operating lease liability
increase decrease in working operating capital
net increase decrease in postretirement liability
other increase decrease in environmental liabilities
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization method qualified affordable housing project investments amortization
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Net Income: income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on sale of business
gain loss on sale of property plant equipment
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
impairment of intangible assets excluding goodwill
defined benefit plan net periodic benefit cost
restructuring charges and restructuring reserve accrual adjustment
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities
